record.field: kw salary advance Apply e-mail template

Hello ${object.employee_id.parent_id.name},

Salary Advance has been applied by ${object.employee_id.name}, ${object.employee_id.job_id.name}, ${object.employee_id.department_id.name} Department.

Advance Details:
Loan Type: ${object.adv_purpose.purpose}
Eligibility Amount: ${object.currency_id.symbol}${'{:,.2f}'.format(object.eligibility_amt)}
Loan Amount: ${object.currency_id.symbol}${'{:,.2f}'.format(object.adv_amnt)}
No of EMI: ${object.total_install}
Required Date: %if object.req_date:
${object.req_date.strftime('%d-%b-%Y')} % endif

% if object.employee_id.user_id and object.employee_id.user_id.signature:
${object.employee_id.user_id.signature | safe} % endif
